Those ratings are on a scale of 1-10 for TS only! A 10 being a darn good TS! You can't use a 1-10 scale including quality compared to DVDRips, that is not right!

I checked the quality of this version compared to: Wrath.Of.The.Titans.2012.TS.NEW.READNFO.XviD-HOPE uploaded by .Bone. and Bone's up I just mentioned is much better quality.

No offense Hackulus, I have much respect for the skull here on TPB, however the version I mentioned is better quality.

I am not new to this, I don't comment much on TPB, and I can't remember my old pirate bay account/login so I just had to make a new comment.

I made this new account just to ask this:
PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE uploaders, let us know when a 3D video source was used! I have not checked this version to see if it was, but on another copy of this movie I downloaded, you could tell it was a 3D movie! It is annoying, and I can't believe I don't see tons of other people bitching about it?!

Just please, mention in the info it was a 3D source, if it was one, so we can not waste our time, bandwidth. If only a 3D source is available, some of us will take what we can get.. However if there are other TS sources available that are not 3d video stream, then we would like to have to option.

I know I know.. your gonna say there is a sample.. Well with this magnet links, I can't select just the sample to download only. It doesn't show any files until a few minutes after the download starts.

It would just be good information for everyone, if the uploader mentions that it is a 3D video source.

Stop trying to distinguish which scale of measurement will apply to ALL of the world's video torrent.  TS or BRIP, who gives a shit.  1 is completely not watchable, 10 is perfect.  If it looks like a 1970's porno camera was used to film, then it'll probably land a rating of a 6 or 7.  True DVD Screeners that are released just before a major movie award ceremony will land a rating of a 10, even if not the most crisp blu ray quality.

Problem reside is the lack of standardization in the ratings, where some compared it to the format used, other one the quality etc  etc  rating should be on QUALITY, no matter the format.

here is one that we should ALL use so that we ALL speak the same "language":

Legio scale: 

10 = Blue ray quality
9   = DVD quality
8   = Excellent
7   = Superior
6   = Very good
5   = standard quality
4   = Bellow standard
3   = extra bellow quality
2   = Horrible
1   = crap
0   = unwatchable

THIS movie thus:

A= 6
V= 3
